stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains how racialist ideology influenced nationalism in the late nineteenth century?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of nationalism in the nineteenth century.

choicesHtml: It provided a justification for widening the voting franchise to reflect the popular will.
It provided a supposedly scientific way of defining national cultures.
It provided Romantic idealists support for their belief that emotional ties created nation-states.
It provided a motive for incorporating colonized peoples into the nation.
